title: Health & Wellbeing
description: Learn vocabulary for discussing physical health, mental wellness, and lifestyle choices.

words.meaning: the state of being comfortable, healthy, and happy
words.example: Regular exercise contributes to overall wellbeing.

words.meaning: a physical or mental sign of illness
words.example: Fatigue is a common symptom of stress.

words.meaning: identification of an illness through examination
words.example: The diagnosis came after several tests.

words.meaning: action taken to stop something from happening
words.example: Prevention is better than cure.

words.meaning: treatment for physical or mental illness
words.example: Physical therapy helped her recover from the injury.

words.meaning: a drug or medicine used to treat illness
words.example: The doctor prescribed medication for his condition.

words.meaning: the process of providing food for health and growth
words.example: Good nutrition is essential for children's development.

words.meaning: resistance to infection or disease
words.example: Vaccines help build immunity against diseases.

words.meaning: lasting for a long time, especially of illness
words.example: Chronic stress can lead to serious health problems.

words.meaning: characterized by much sitting and little physical activity
words.example: A sedentary lifestyle increases health risks.

words.meaning: producing good effects
words.example: Walking is beneficial for both physical and mental health.

words.meaning: average in amount or intensity
words.example: Moderate exercise is recommended for beginners.

words.meaning: treating the whole person, not just symptoms
words.example: The clinic offers a holistic approach to healthcare.

words.meaning: able to recover quickly from difficulties
words.example: Emotionally resilient people cope better with stress.

words.meaning: awareness of the present moment
words.example: Practicing mindfulness can reduce anxiety.

words.meaning: to identify an illness through examination
words.example: The doctor diagnosed her with a vitamin deficiency.

words.meaning: to recommend a treatment or medicine
words.example: The physician prescribed rest and plenty of fluids.

words.meaning: to return to normal health after illness
words.example: It took months to fully recover from the surgery.

words.meaning: to keep in good condition
words.example: Regular check-ups help maintain good health.

words.meaning: to make pain or suffering less severe
words.example: Stretching can alleviate muscle tension.

words.meaning: exhaustion caused by prolonged stress
words.example: Many employees experience burnout from overwork.

words.meaning: feeling of worry or nervousness
words.example: Anxiety can affect both mental and physical health.

words.meaning: condition of being very overweight
words.example: Obesity increases the risk of heart disease.

words.meaning: inability to sleep
words.example: Stress often leads to insomnia.

words.meaning: chemical processes in the body that maintain life
words.example: Exercise helps boost metabolism.

words.meaning: additional nutrient taken to improve diet
words.example: Many people take vitamin supplements.

words.meaning: process of restoring health after illness or injury
words.example: Rehabilitation after surgery takes several weeks.

words.meaning: spread from one person to another
words.example: The flu is highly contagious.

words.meaning: causing harm or damage
words.example: Smoking is detrimental to your health.

words.meaning: likely to be affected by something
words.example: Elderly people are more susceptible to infections.

exercises.instruction: Match the words with their definitions

pairs.definition: a physical or mental sign of illness
to make pain or suffering less severe

exercises.instruction: Complete the sentences with the correct words

sentences.sentence: A _____ lifestyle with little physical activity can lead to weight gain.
The doctor will _____ the appropriate medication for your condition.
_____ is better than cure when it comes to health.
It took her six months to fully _____ from the accident.

exercises.instruction: Choose the best word to complete each sentence

questions.question: Regular exercise is _____ for both physical and mental health.
Many people experience _____ from working too many hours without rest.
